ProductInfo.Features:
30-inch widescreen HD-ready LCD television with 10 watts per channel x 2 and a built-in NTSC tuner; 31.9 x 19.3 x 4.3 inches (W x H x D)
Active Control Plus adjusts picture settings at over 60 times per second for all inputs, even adjusting for changes in ambient viewing light
Pixel Plus technology upconverts interlaced video sources for enhanced sharpness and depth
Digital Crystal Clear III technology and anti-reflective coating ensure high (350:1) contrast, high (450 cd/m3) brightness
Includes wall mount and table stand; offers center-channel input, subwoofer output, and headphone output with dedicated volume control
ProductInfo.Name: Philips 30PF9975/17 30-Inch Widescreen Flat Panel HDTV-Ready LCD TV
